div.p: LISA: I'd rationalize when I was using, that oh, I'm an adult, I pay my own bills, I have money to do it...
LISA: I shouldn't feel bad about doing it even though I have a child because I am an adult I make my own decisions, that's how I'd rationalize it.
LISA: But in the back of my head I knew it was still that if I have to sit there and rationalize it --doing drugs-- probably a little irrational all in it's self.
LISA: So that's how my husband i both rationlized you know our using. Oh it's okay.
